summary: This node allows you to consume Netscaler ADC API for operations like creating and installing certificates.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to work with (Certificate, File, Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform (Create, Install, Custom API Call).

parameters.name: certificateFileName
parameters.description: Name for the generated certificate file.

parameters.name: certificateFormat
parameters.description: Format in which the certificate is stored on the appliance (PEM, DER).

parameters.name: certificateType
parameters.description: Type of certificate to create (Root-CA, Intermediate-CA, Server, Client).

parameters.name: caCertificateFileName
parameters.description: Name of the CA certificate file that issues and signs the certificates.

parameters.name: caCertificateFileFormat
parameters.description: Format of the CA certificate file (PEM, DER).
